title: Tucson, USA
description: Aerospace Maintenance and Regeneration Center. AMARC is located in the town of Tucson, Arizona in the USA. Arizona is a south, western state which borders Mexico. One of the reasons that AMARC is situated here is the dry, arid environment which exists in the area all year round.
theme:
MANKIND. Traces of human presence
on once virgin lands
